levels we
enter a recession well we're way below
where we were for each of these

and again gold is real money gold is

right now to let us know that everything

and the past month should approve this
if there were any type of doubt at all
it is hard for investors in some

dictated the stock prices it was always

that is to say every time the Fed

and they increased their balance sheet
stocks went up now we know that they're

they're raising rates at the same time
which means yields on bonds are becoming
competing assets learning investors away

other central
banks that have been buying tech stocks

now if we go back in time to 2012 Jerome

there will be a stock market crash if

right now is exactly what he predicted

back in 2012 Chairman Fed Powell told us

their timing of when they cut because
when you look at the stock market and
you look at the central bank's balance

now when the central bank the Fed

now with the yield curve they're

right now as they raise their interest
rates
as they cut their balance sheet and the
